column4: I have a microSD card ( and reader ) and I am trying to remove the .Trash-mistone folder but it says its read only

MS OS licenses to OEMs dictate that all OEMs *MUST* provide hard-copy installation media. call HP and ask for your Vista install disk. if they hesitate, ask to speak to their MS lidcensing unit.
they all do. that does not fulfill their contractual obligation to provido original media.
think "i replaced my hard drive and ...."  ;)
no no. but if someone replaces a drive, that SOOOPER SEKRIT OOOO VISTA partition is as useless as a whistle on a squid
